meanings.definition: A sandwich consisting of a cooked patty of ground meat placed inside a sliced bread roll or bun.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat burgers with cheese and ketchup.
meanings.sent2: At the picnic, everyone enjoyed the delicious burgers.
meanings.sent3: The burger was so big, it looked like a tower of meat and bread.
meanings.sent4: Her love for burgers was as strong as her love for sunny days.
meanings.sent5: The sizzling sound of the burgers on the grill made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A person who makes, sells, or serves burgers.
meanings.sent1: The friendly burgers at the food truck always greet customers with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The burgers at the new restaurant are made by a talented chef.
meanings.sent3: The burger expert knew every secret to making the perfect patty.
meanings.sent4: She was a burger magician, turning simple ingredients into delicious meals.
meanings.sent5: The burgers from the famous chef were like pieces of art on a plate.
